name: War-Ships (raghunandan)
description:
Short and punishing naval battles. Plan shots, dodge enemy cannon, and outwit opponents to score satisfying victories.

Description
  • There are two cannons, one on either side of the ship.
  • Each cannon takes time to reload. Plan your shots.
  • Ram into the enemy ship to cause damage.
  • Choose upgrades, duel with randomized enemies, and complete a campaign of 10 levels.
  • The ship HP will be reset to maximum after every battle.
  • There are 10 stats, but you can upgrade only 5 of them over the course of the campaign.
  • Have fun!
Controls
  • Turn Left: 'Left Arrow'
  • Turn Right: 'Right Arrow'
  • (The ship always accelerates forward)
  • Fire Left Cannon: 'A' (Or press the on-screen button)
  • Fire Right Cannon: 'D' (Or press the on-screen button)
  • Pause Game: 'Esc'/'P' (Use 'P' while in fullscreen mode)

The ship controls can be reconfigured from the 'Settings' menu.
